message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $80 to me, but I'm open to discussing a fair price. Let's start with $95. Looking forward to your response!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation and am willing to meet in the middle. My counteroffer is $90 for the product.
